data.title: Fraunces Tavern
data.meta_description: There is a museum above Fraunces Tavern in the financial district of NYC (lower manhattan). The Sons of Revolution began here, and George Washington himself had a tearful goodbye with his soldiers here as well. I recommend the Tavern House Salad if you eat in the restaurant. Yum! twitter.com/NYPLMaps/status/6341065770
data.text:
There is a museum above Fraunces Tavern in the financial district of NYC (lower manhattan). The Sons of Revolution began here, and George Washington himself had a tearful goodbye with his soldiers here as well. I recommend the Tavern House Salad if you eat in the restaurant. Yum!

twitter.com/NYPLMaps/status/6341065770
